document.full_text: the puck that was dropped on the ice 1.6 seconds before the rangers clinched the title in 1994 to end their 54-year stanley cup drought was picked up by a canucks player and given to the team's owner.
document.title: rangers' stanley cup puck found, and ex-canucks owner has it
lines_and_colors: the puck that was dropped on the ice 1.6 seconds before the rangers clinched the title in 1994 to end their 54-year stanley cup drought was picked up by a canucks player and given to the team's owner.
